description: Design, implementation and presentation of a research project in the area of veterinary pathology and infectious disease, approved by the course coordinator with emphasis on defining the research issue, establishing methodology, undertaking appropriate analysis of data and drawing defensible conclusions. Students completing the course in two semesters must enrol in VETS7618 (Semester 1 and 2) if commencing in semester 1 or VETS7619 (semester 2 and semester 1 of the following year) if commencing in semester 2.
